references.paper_title: Generalized predictive model for autonomous driving.
references.reason: This paper is important because GenAD enhances generalization capability of world models by training on large-scale datasets.

references.paper_title: Vista: A generalizable driving world model with high fidelity and versatile controllability.
references.reason: This paper is important because Vista introduces explicit re-weighted generation loss on structural and moving areas.
This paper is important because it presents Diffusion Transformer(DiT), a significant advancement in the field due to its better scalability and lower computational cost.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners.
references.reason: This paper is important because Masked autoencoders are a powerful self-supervised method for representation learning from large-scale data.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper is important because it presents latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis.
